title: What is the Sanskrit name of all musical instruments? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to “The Practical Sanskrit-English Dictionary” edited by Vaman Shivram Apte, 4th edition Delhi 1995 , published by Motilal Banarasidass, Page 842, column 3, the word “Vaadhyam” means: A musical instrument.The sound of a musical instrument.
